page.title: 04MY HOUSE IS SEMI-DETACHED.
page.content: My house is a semi_detached. We have a chimney because we have a coal fire. It is made of bricks, with a tiled roof. It is a{council house}and we pay rent. We have a washer. When the clothes have been washed my mum dries them in the tumble dryer but on fine days she pegs them on the line. My mam does most of the cooking. My dad can cook but only if he has to and he is not as good as my mam. My favourate meal is{Sunday}dinner. On a {Sunday}evening my mam will make crisps sandwiches for tea. In the living room we have a video and a colour T.V. We have two bedrooms. In my bedroom there is a cupboard, two beds and some toys and a ghetto. This is a large radio. My dad is{unenployed}and my mam does not work. I have one brother. He is called Scott. Ilike living in Lundwood.
